meta.content: Tuition-free, 6-12 charter school, providing a rigorous Cambridge curriculum, character/leadership development, extracurricular and athletic opportunities in Surprise, Arizona.
charter school, Cambridge, Cambridge curriculum, award-winning, character, leadership, extracurricular, athletics, surprise az, surprise Arizona

img.p: Imagine Prep provides an exceptional educational experience that emphasizes student engagement and professionalism through a rigorous 21st Century Cambridge curriculum that fosters collaboration, communication, critical thinking, and creativity.

div.div: Beginning April 13, the high school elective classes will have independent projects to complete for a 4th quarter grade.
As of Monday, March 30th, our instructional program will move to a remote learning environment. Below you will see an overview that describes the major components of this program.
Free Lunch and Breakfasts are still available. Also, don't forget to update your info or apply with the National Lunch Program.
Imagine Prep Surprise will be offering a Middle School Summer School program for any families interested in extending their child's learning opportunities into the month of June.
